name: The Journey 2: Castle Quest
description:
Castle Quest is a 2D platform game in which the main character, a knight, explores the different rooms in a castle. By collecting keys he will be able to open the doors to access new zones. He will have to fight various characters, and be quick and precise with his movements... to avoid being taken captive and imprisoned in the dungeon.

Credits

This game was created using some assets provided by the following developers / artists in itch.io. Thank you.

  • Hero Knight by Sven Thole -> https://sventhole.itch.io
  • Wizard by LuizMelo --> https://luizmelo.itch.io/
  • Pixel Castle 2D by Szadi art --> https://szadiart.itch.io/
  • Medieval tavern props by System G6 / Qoma --> https://system-g6.itch.io/
  • Main theme and battle songs by Andrew LiVecchi  https://itch.io/profile/masterofrevels
